column4: oh for fuck sake, if i can not get this new release of ubuntu working normally by the end of the weekend im giving up on it, i dont know what is happening up at conical but you guys earned he reputation of being the best easy to use distro out there, this is just nuts
networking issues, window manager issues, just installed the nvidia-current package because the default ones dont display properly
my window manager is not loading, it is a fresh install
since it turned purple by default
